verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> O God בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come גוֹיִ֨ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> the heathen בְּֽנַחֲלָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H5159><s%> into thine inheritance טִ֭מְּאוּ <S%H2930><s%> have they defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H6944><s%> thy holy שָׂ֖מוּ <S%H7760><s%> they have laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem לְעִיִּֽים׃ <S%H5856><s%> on heaps

נָֽתְנ֡וּ <S%H5414><s%> have they given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִבְלַ֬ת <S%H5038><s%> The dead bodies עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants מַ֭אֲכָל <S%H3978><s%> [to be] meat לְע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> unto the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh חֲ֝סִידֶ֗יךָ <S%H2623><s%> of thy saints לְחַיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> unto the beasts אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

שָׁפְכ֬וּ <S%H8210><s%> have they shed דָמָ֨ם ׀ <S%H1818><s%> Their blood כַּמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> like water סְֽבִ֘יב֤וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there קוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H6912><s%> and [there was] none to bury

הָיִ֣ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> have חֶ֭רְפָּה <S%H2781><s%> We are become a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <S%H7047><s%> and derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5439><s%> to them that are round about

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah תֶּאֱנַ֣ף <S%H599><s%> be angry לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> alway תִּבְעַ֥ר <S%H1197><s%> burn כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like אֵ֝֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> burning קִנְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7068><s%> envy

שְׁפֹ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> Pour out חֲמָתְךָ֨ <S%H2534><s%> thy wrath אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> upon הַגּוֹיִם֮ <S%H1471><s%> upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֪ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְדָ֫ע֥וּךָ <S%H3045><s%> that have not known וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and upon מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <S%H4467><s%> thee and upon the kingdoms אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> upon thy name לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> that have not called

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> for אָכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> For they have devoured אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָוֵ֥הוּ <S%H5116><s%> his dwelling place הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃ <S%H8074><s%> and laid waste אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּזְכָּר־ <S%H2142><s%> burn

לָנוּ֮ עֲוֹנֹ֪ת <S%H5771><s%> iniquities רִאשֹׁ֫נִ֥ים <S%H7223><s%> not against us former מַ֭הֵר <S%H4118><s%> speedily יְקַדְּמ֣וּנוּ <S%H6923><s%> prevent רַחֲמֶ֑יךָ <S%H7356><s%> let thy tender mercies כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for דַלּ֣וֹנוּ <S%H1809><s%> low מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> very

עָזְרֵ֤נוּ ׀ <S%H5826><s%> Help אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֗נוּ <S%H3468><s%> of our salvation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> for כְּבֽוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> the glory שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> of thy name וְהַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <S%H5337><s%> and deliver וְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> us and purge away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חַ֝טֹּאתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> our sins לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> for thy name's

לָ֤מָּה ׀ <S%H4100><s%> Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> say הַגּוֹיִם֮ <S%H1471><s%> Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּ֪ה <S%H346><s%> Where אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H430><s%> angels יִוָּדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge [בַּגִּיִּים כ] (בַּגֹּויִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations ק) לְעֵינֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5869><s%> in our sight נִ֝קְמַ֗ת <S%H5360><s%> [by] the revenging דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> of the blood עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants הַשָּׁפֽוּךְ׃ <S%H8210><s%> [which is] shed

תָּ֤ב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> come לְפָנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> before אֶנְקַ֪ת <S%H603><s%> Let the sighing אָ֫סִ֥יר <S%H616><s%> prisoner כְּגֹ֥דֶל <S%H1433><s%> thee according to the greatness זְרוֹעֲךָ֑ <S%H2220><s%> of thy power ה֝וֹתֵ֗ר <S%H3498><s%> preserve בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> thou those that are appointed תְמוּתָֽה׃ <S%H8546><s%> to die

וְהָ֘שֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> And render לִשְׁכֵנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> unto our neighbours שִׁ֭בְעָתַיִם <S%H7659><s%> sevenfold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into חֵיקָ֑ם <S%H2436><s%> into their bosom חֶרְפָּ֘תָ֤ם <S%H2781><s%> their reproach אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which חֵרְפ֣וּךָ <S%H2778><s%> wherewith they have reproached אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> thee O Lord

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עַמְּךָ֨ ׀ <S%H5971><s%> So we thy people וְצֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> and sheep מַרְעִיתֶךָ֮ <S%H4830><s%> of thy pasture נ֤וֹדֶ֥ה <S%H3034><s%> will give thee thanks לְּךָ֗ לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> to all וָדֹ֑ר <S%H1755><s%> generations נְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> we will shew forth תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> thy praise
